header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced software engineer with 6+ years developing cloud-native solutions and deployment systems. Proven track record building scalable data platforms, event-driven architectures, and deployment pipelines using AWS services. Strong background in both backend development and infrastructure automation, with expertise in schema management, stream processing, and cross-team collaboration in agile environments.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Developed event data payload schema registry and AWS Kinesis integration libraries serving Disney+ and Hulu platforms, enabling seamless data streaming across the organization
Architected and built a stream snapshot system enabling teams to maintain state from AWS Kinesis streams, supporting content metadata catalogs for millions of users
Designed complex validation and deployment pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for schema registry repositories, implementing semantic versioning and compatibility checks
Developed multi-language artifact publishing system generating Scala, Java, and Python artifacts and Protobuf schema files from AWS Smithy schema definitions

Built comprehensive libraries integrating directly with schema registry artifacts, providing JSON/Protobuf serialization, equality functionality, and testing integration across multiple programming languages
Collaborated with multiple engineering teams to migrate from OpenAPI to AWS Smithy schemas, ensuring zero-downtime deployment across production systems

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed blockchain nodes for the company's proof-of-stake platform enabling supply chain verification, implementing staking algorithms and distributed consensus mechanisms
Built a blockchain runtime using Akka actors with TCP networking, and designed HTTP APIs for node management and transaction key operations
Developed a transaction streaming client using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB for real-time transaction indexing and querying
Created a proof-of-concept React UI demonstrating integration capabilities, showcasing event-driven architecture patterns

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Handled full-stack development on Teams web application for construction project management, managing submittals, RFIs, issues, and change orders
Architected a cutting-edge Event Sourced system for Change Management, storing user interactions as events and deriving application state from event data
Built end-to-end features spanning database models, C# microservices APIs, and UI components deployed to Azure cloud infrastructure
Worked with diverse data storage solutions including MSSQL databases and Event Store for event sourcing implementations
Integrated with enterprise resource management systems, enabling seamless synchronization between the web application and flagship Vista product

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Developed an automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define test cases using simple C# code for API and UI interactions
Built a comprehensive API testing framework making calls to backend microservices and Selenium-based UI testing with XPath selectors
Executed performance testing including bulk operations and load testing to ensure application responsiveness and scalability
Balanced manual testing responsibilities with automation development, writing and executing test cases for continuous quality assurance
